item.description:
Where?
Starbucks on 443 Boylston at Berkeley. We are most often at a downstairs table, but you can occasionally find us on the patio.

Who should come?
Rational sojourners! Anyone with an interest in Ayn Rand who would like to meet fellow admirers.

Why should people come?
To meet & drink beverages & socialize & ponder A is A and man qua man!

What's a good ice-breaker question members can ask each other?
What is your favorite film embodying one or more of Rand's virtues? (Example: Saturday Night Fever is about a young man coming of age who realizes that life is not all parties and discos, and that he ought to make more of his life. Virtues: mostly productiveness, some integrity and independence.)

Should members bring anything?
Yourselves!

How will members find you when they get there?
I'll have dollar-sign bling bling.

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Ayn Rand January Meetup
